title: Oromocto launches glass recycling pilot project
description: The Town of Oromocto launched a four-month pilot project for disposing glass food jars to prevent the recyclable material from ending up in landfills.
content: The Town of Oromocto has launched a four month pilot project for disposing of glass food jars to prevent the recyclable material from ending up in landfills Rayan Environmental Solutions a glass recycling company based in Moncton was looking to expand it chars
